name: MS Teams
description: Break through siloes in a mixed Mattermost and Teams environment by forwarding real-time chat notifications from Teams to Mattermost.

settings.help_text: The AES encryption key used to encrypt stored access tokens
Microsoft Teams will use this secret to send messages to Mattermost

settings.display_name: Use the evaluation API pay model
settings.help_text: The evaluation API pay model only allows you to get a limited number of change notifications. Be sure your system keeps them low if you enable this setting
Sync notifications of chat messages for any connected user that enables the feature.

settings.display_name: Maximum size of attachments to support complete one time download (in MB)
settings.help_text: Set the maximum size for attachments that can be loaded into the memory. Attachments bigger than this size will be streamed from MS Teams to Mattermost

settings.display_name: Buffer size for streaming files (in MB)
settings.help_text: Set the buffer size for streaming files from MS Teams to Mattermost
The maximum number of users that may connect their MS Teams account. Once connected, users may reconnect at any time. (Set to 0 to disable new connections.)

Invite pool size: the maximum number of connection invites that may be pending at a given time. When specified, connection invite direct messages will be sent to users as they become active, up to the maximum specified here. As invited users connect, spaces in the invite pool will open up and more invites will be sent out. Once invited, users may connect at any time. (Set to 0 or leave empty to disable connection invites.)
When true, only whitelisted users may connect their account.
Allows the plugin to send notification from Mattermost as activities in Microsoft Teams.
